title: Another World Where I Can’t Even Collapse and Die - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Caring Protagonist   Dragon Riders   Dragons   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Magic Beasts   Monsters   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Transported to Another World   Weak Protagonist
author: Natsuno Yoruko   夏野 夜子
description: Sumire, who suddenly arrived in another world before she could get on her feet, has no particular mission. She doesn’t have any special powers, but she’s working at the Adventurer’s Guild in a beginner’s town, where she doesn’t have to face any powerful enemies. Well-liked by a mysterious man and the fledgling adventurers and living comfortably among the otherworldly flora and fauna, what does Sumire’s future hold?>
